description.name: etharbitrum
description.tagline: Ethereum arbitrum Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto arbitrum-eth Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Ethereum arbitrum directly on your website
Unique arbitrum/eth receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your arbitrum/eth wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
